name: The Relic ([@.i.]™)
description: Game objective is to reach "The Relic", with life to spear, solving the mysteriously golden looking trap labyrinth. To decipher the maze you will need to find the matching objects that unlock the passages along the way. To find the required items you will need to listen for the discreet echo's made by the active puzzle pieces and apply them to the correct entrance, as you discover the true lost treasure!
